title: Episode 11 - Perez Hilton
description:
Perez Hilton joins the show and talks about being an OG paparazzi, and what went wrong for him on TikTok. The Dave/Bryce Hall beef returns, and the guys wonder if it could be squashed. Everyones favorite game of Zoomer/Boomer is back again.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/bffspod
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
